languages.text: "Мы — ткачи. Служители культа Кровавой паутины, что оплетает нитями веры отсеки твоего флагмана. Незримые клинки возмездия, что служат Неумирающему Императора. Проводники тех, кому пора на другую сторону". {n}Вновь слышится ропот собравшихся: "Культисты смерти!.."{/n}

"We are the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. Our cult holds the bays of your flagship together with the threads of our faith. We are an instrument of retribution, the silent blade sworn in service to the Undying Emperor. We guide those whose time has come, and usher them to the other side." {n}A murmur runs through the gathered crowd. "Death cultists!"{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы — ткачи. Служители культа Кровавой паутины, что оплетает нитями веры отсеки твоего флагмана. Незримые клинки возмездия, что служат Неумирающему Императора. Проводники тех, кому пора на другую сторону". {n}Вновь слышится ропот собравшихся: "Культисты смерти!.."{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We are weavers. Members the Bloodspun Web cult that entangles the bays of your flagship in threads of faith. Unseen avenging daggers that serve the Undying Emperor. Usherers of those for whom the time has come to cross over to the other side." {n}Murmurs are heard again among the gathering. "Death cultists!"{/n}

languages.text: « Nous sommes les tisseurs de la Toile de Sang. Les fils de notre foi maintiennent la cohésion de votre vaisseau amiral. Nous sommes l'instrument du châtiment, la lame silencieuse au service de l'Empereur Immortel. Nous guidons ceux dont l'heure est venue vers l'autre côté. » {n}Un murmure parcourt la foule assemblée. « Des cultistes de la mort ! »{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. Our cult holds the bays of your flagship together with the threads of our faith. We are an instrument of retribution, the silent blade sworn in service to the Undying Emperor. We guide those whose time has come, and usher them to the other side." {n}A murmur runs through the gathered crowd. "Death cultists!"{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes les tisseurs de la Toile de Sang. Les fils de notre foi maintiennent la cohésion de votre vaisseau amiral. Nous sommes l'instrument du châtiment, la lame silencieuse au service de l'Empereur Immortel. Nous guidons ceux dont l'heure est venue vers l'autre côté. » {n}Un murmure parcourt la foule assemblée. « Des cultistes de la mort ! »{/n}

languages.text: «Somos los tejedores de la Red Sanguinolenta. Nuestro culto mantiene unidas las bahías de su nave insignia con los hilos de nuestra fe. Somos un instrumento de justicia, la hoja silenciosa en servicio juramentado al Emperador Inmortal. Guiamos a aquellos cuya hora ha llegado y los enviamos al otro lado». {n}Un murmullo recorre la multitud presente: «¡Cultistas de la muerte!».{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. Our cult holds the bays of your flagship together with the threads of our faith. We are an instrument of retribution, the silent blade sworn in service to the Undying Emperor. We guide those whose time has come, and usher them to the other side." {n}A murmur runs through the gathered crowd. "Death cultists!"{/n}

Guiamos a aquellos cuya hora ha llegado y los enviamos al otro lado». {n}Un murmullo recorre la multitud presente: «¡Cultistas de la muerte!».{/n}

languages.text: “我们是织血罗网的织网者。我们的教派通过信仰的丝线，将我们与你的旗舰编织在一起。我们是复仇的工具，是效忠于不死帝皇的寂静之刃。我们会引导那些大限已至的人，将他们带往彼岸。”{n}聚集的人群中传来了一阵低语声：“是拜死教的信徒！”{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. Our cult holds the bays of your flagship together with the threads of our faith. We are an instrument of retribution, the silent blade sworn in service to the Undying Emperor. We guide those whose time has come, and usher them to the other side." {n}A murmur runs through the gathered crowd. "Death cultists!"{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们是织血罗网的织网者。我们的教派通过信仰的丝线，将我们与你的旗舰编织在一起。我们是复仇的工具，是效忠于不死帝皇的寂静之刃。我们会引导那些大限已至的人，将他们带往彼岸。”{n}聚集的人群中传来了一阵低语声：“是拜死教的信徒！”{/n}

languages.text: 「我々はブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手です。我々の教団は、あなた方の旗艦のベイを、我々の信仰の糸で繋いでいるのです。我々は報復の道具であり、不滅の皇帝に仕えると誓った、静かなる刃でもあります。我々は時が来た者をあの世へと導きます」{n}集まった群衆の間にざわめきが起こる。「死のカルトめ！」{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. Our cult holds the bays of your flagship together with the threads of our faith. We are an instrument of retribution, the silent blade sworn in service to the Undying Emperor. We guide those whose time has come, and usher them to the other side." {n}A murmur runs through the gathered crowd. "Death cultists!"{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々はブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手です。我々の教団は、あなた方の旗艦のベイを、我々の信仰の糸で繋いでいるのです。我々は報復の道具であり、不滅の皇帝に仕えると誓った、静かなる刃でもあります。我々は時が来た者をあの世へと導きます」{n}集まった群衆の間にざわめきが起こる。「死のカルトめ！」{/n}

languages.text: "Wir sind die Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Unser Kult hält die Module Eures Flaggschiffs seit vielen Jahren mit den Fäden unseres Glaubens zusammen. Wir sind ein Instrument der Vergeltung, die stumme Klinge, die dem Todlosen Imperator treu dient. Wir geleiten jene, deren Zeit gekommen ist, auf die andere Seite." {n}Ein Murmeln geht durch die versammelte Menge. "Todeskultisten!"{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. Our cult holds the bays of your flagship together with the threads of our faith. languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı'nın dokurlarıyız. Tarikatımız, bu sancak gemisinin bölmelerini inancımızın iplikleriyle örüp bir araya getirmiştir. Ölmeyen İmparator'a hizmet için yemin etmiş bir sessiz hançer ve intikam aracıyız. Vakti dolanlara yol gösterip bu hayata göz yummalarına yardım ederiz." {n}Kalabalıktan bir fısıltı duyuluyor. "Ölüm tarikatçıları!"{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. Our cult holds the bays of your flagship together with the threads of our faith. We are an instrument of retribution, the silent blade sworn in service to the Undying Emperor. We guide those whose time has come, and usher them to the other side." {n}A murmur runs through the gathered crowd. "Death cultists!"{/n}
